entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C

Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 11:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

Wind: km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 near the river. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 near the river in the morning and early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 10:57 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
